Articles.Content:
I am about to write my christmas wishlist, then i realised that i really wanted a joystick for KSP. A good set with some translational controls would be fantastic.

What are your experiences with joysticks and KSP? I really need some quick help on this one because i need to have it done very soon.
Thread bumping is bad etiquette, but I suggest anything by logitech as their customer support is excellent
The Logitech Extreme 3D Pro is a good standard model. Has twist axis and throttle control.

if you got the money, buy ch or thrustmaster. if you dont, get a saitek. if you cant afford that, im sorry.

Edited December 4, 2013 by Nuke

Logitech Extreme 3D pro. So good for so cheap. Mine is 5-ish years old and has outlived three Driving wheels and a joystick.

http://www.amazon.com/Logitech-Extreme-Joystick-Silver-Black/dp/B00009OY9U/ref=pd_sim_sbs_e_1
